title: Poisoned Pipeline Execution Attacks: A Look at CI-CD Environments
summary: In this blog, we examine three types of poisoned pipeline execution (PPE) attacks, methods to exploit these types of vulnerabilities, and recommended preventive measures.

title: Making desync attacks easy with TRACE
